Built for versatility, this foldable blanket unfolds to reveal a powerful solar panel perfect for charging your devices while camping, RVing, boating, or enjoying a day at the beach. Its flexible design allows it to conform to various surfaces, maximizing sun exposure and energy generation.

This versatile solar panel blanket combines powerful energy generation with convenient portability, making it the perfect companion for your outdoor adventures.

  • 18V Output Voltage: Delivering a reliable power source for charging devices.

This solar panel blanket is designed with optimal performance in mind. While specific details like dimensions and weight are best found on the product packaging, here's what you can expect:

  • Operating Temperature Range: Suitable for a wide range of outdoor conditions.
  • Waterproof Construction: Withstands light rain and moisture.

This solar panel blanket offers numerous advantages for camping, RVing, boating, and other outdoor activities:

  • Off-Grid Power: Charge your devices independently of traditional power sources.
  • Sustainable Energy: Harness the power of the sun for a clean and eco-friendly solution.
  • Lightweight and Portable: Easily transport it to remote locations without added burden.
  • Versatile Applications: Use it for charging phones, laptops, lights, and more.

Using this solar panel blanket is simple and straightforward:

  1. Position the blanket in direct sunlight. The angle of the sun will impact power output, so adjust accordingly.
  2. Connect your device to the appropriate port on the panel using a compatible cable (not included).
  3. Monitor the charging progress on your device. Charging times may vary depending on the device's battery capacity and sunlight intensity.

Remember to always refer to the manufacturer's instructions for specific usage guidelines and safety precautions.
